aka: くりいむレモン 黒猫館~亜里沙の肖像~
this_title: くりいむレモン 黒猫館
trans_title: くりいむレモン 黒猫館~亜里沙の肖像~
introduction: 【Based on comic books】The Cream Lemon Video Series based on the popular manga of the same title, focusing on the forbidden love between brothers and sisters. 6th Title: I love you to death.A girl in a wheelchair, Arisa, has not met Masaki, an art student for 3 years. She lives with her mother, Saeko, and a housemaid. Masaki is Arisa's half-brother and comes to her house when Saeko asks him to draw her portrait. At night, Masaki sees Saeko and the maid making love. The next day, Masaki has trouble concentrating on his drawing because of what he saw the night before. Arisa comforts him but Saeko cannot accept their behavior and begins to lure Masaki. Arisa tries to stop her mother, but her mother's actions only escalate. Finally, Masaki indulges in carnal desires with Saeko and the maid. When Masaki wakes up, they are gone, and Arisa tells him an incredible fact…
foreign_title: くりいむレモン 黒猫館
